segments.text: This kitchen is a disaster waiting to happen, and it infuriates me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The faucet's running wild, overflowing everywhere—who left it on?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water's ruining the cabinets and floor, what a careless mess!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: And that woman just stands there, drying a stupid plate like it's no big deal.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot's soaked, but she's blind to the chaos around her.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the kids—climbing on an unstable stool like reckless fools.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy's about to tip over reaching for cookies; how irresponsible!
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl encouraging him—stealing treats when they shouldn't.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinet, cookies spilling out—total disregard for rules.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The serene garden view mocks this indoor negligence.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I'm fuming at how no one's paying attention to the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This kind of sloppiness drives me up the wall.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Someone needs to snap out of it before everything breaks.
segments.speaker: PAR
